channel.title: Incident Response on A Place for Poor Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Incident Response on A Place for Poor Examples

item.title: Breakdown; post-mortem of a process failure
item.description: I was reviewing an old incident review doc where I wrote up some of the high level learnings from the incident. Thought it was worth sharing, with the details omitted to protect the innocent. Some backstory; we were trying to load test a component and ended up getting the load testing done at the last minute right before customer launch. The team had to work into the weekend to meet the customer deadline.
